entry.dcterms:description: employment and subsistance conditions of Moldovean Csángós living in Budapest and its agglomeration; main issues: what financial situation they leave to go abroad and what financial and other experiences they go back to their homeland. Topics: the situations of the Moldavean Csángó family farms, subsistance conditions, conditions and circumstances of going abroad to work, the values of the guest workers and their relationship to the Hungarian social environment
